Method Detail

getDirection

public int getDirection()
Gets the current direction of this structure.

Returns:
the direction of this structure, an angle between 0 and 359 degrees.

getGrid

public Grid<Structure> getGrid()
Gets the grid of this structure.

Returns:
the grid of this structure.

getLocation

public Location getLocation()
Gets the location of this structure.

Returns:
the location of this structure.

setDirection

public void setDirection(int newDirection)
Sets the current direction of this structure.

Parameters:
newDirection - the new direction. The direction of this structure is set to the angle between 0 and 359 degrees that is equivalent to newDirection.

putSelfInGrid

public void putSelfInGrid(Grid<Structure> gr,
                          Location loc)
Puts this structure into a grid. If there is another structure at the given location, it is removed.
Precondition: (1) This structure is not contained in a grid (2) loc is valid in gr

Parameters:
gr - the grid into which this structure should be placed
loc - the location into which the structure shold be placed

moveTo

public void moveTo(Location newLocation)
Moves this structure to a new location. If there's another structure at the new location, that structure is removed.
Precondition: (1) This structure is contained in a grid (2) newLocation is valid in the grid of this structure

Parameters:
newLocation - the new location

removeSelfFromGrid

public void removeSelfFromGrid()
Removes this structure from its grid.
Precondition: This structure is contained in a grid

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Creates a string that describes an structure

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
String with the location, direction, min and max temps, size, meat value, life, and speed of this structure.
